title: PROJECTNAME SSN data
description:
Pseudonymized data of the semantic social network from the PROJECTNAME project.

---
{"editor":"simple"}
---
Project website: PROJECTWEBSITE

resources.name: annotations

fields.name: id
fields.title: id
fields.description: Unique ID for the annotation

fields.name: version
fields.title: version
fields.description: Open Ethnographer version

fields.name: text
fields.title: text
fields.description: Comment field that ethnographer can use to explain their thinking behind the annotation.

fields.name: quote
fields.title: quote
fields.description: The snippet of text being annotated.

fields.name: uri
fields.title: uri
fields.description: The URI of the resource being annotated

fields.name: created_at
fields.title: created_at
fields.description: The annotation's creation date.

fields.name: updated_at
fields.title: updated_at
fields.description: The annotation's update date.

fields.name: post_id
fields.title: post_id
fields.description: ID of the post annotated.

fields.name: creator_id
fields.title: creator_id
fields.description: Unique ID of the ethnographer who created the annotation

fields.name: type
fields.title: type
fields.description: Type of resource being annotated (text, image, etc.)

fields.name: shape
fields.title: shape
fields.description: When annotating multimedia resources, identifies the portion of the image being annotated.

fields.name: code_id
fields.title: code_id
fields.description: Unique ID of the code associated to the quote or part of the multimedia resource.

resources.description: Ethnographic annotations from the PROJECTNAME project.

resources.name: codes

fields.name: id
fields.title: id
fields.description: Unique ID for the code

fields.name: description
fields.title: description
fields.description: An extended description of the code and what kind of testimonies it points to

fields.name: creator_id
fields.title: creator_id
fields.description: Unique ID for the ethnographer that created this code

fields.name: created_at
fields.title: created_at
fields.description: Creation date

fields.name: updated_at
fields.title: updated_at
fields.description: Date of the latest update.

fields.name: ancestry
fields.title: ancestry
fields.description: Parent code

fields.name: names
fields.title: names
fields.description: List referring to this code of names and the languages they are expressed in.

fields.name: name_with_path
fields.title: name_with_path
fields.description: The name of the code, preceded by those of the codes in its ancestry.

resources.description: Ethnographic codes from the PROJECTNAME project

resources.name: participants

fields.name: participant
fields.title: participant
fields.description: Unique ID of the participant

resources.description: A pseudonymized list of participants to the PROJECTNAME conversation.

resources.name: posts

fields.name: post_number
fields.title: post_number
fields.description: Progressive number of the post in the topic.

fields.name: post_id
fields.title: post_id
fields.description: Unique ID for the post

fields.name: created_at
fields.title: created_at
fields.description: Post creation date

fields.name: topic_id
fields.title: topic_id
fields.description: Unique ID for the topic (forum thread) that the post is in.

fields.name: reply_count
fields.title: reply_count
fields.description: The number of direct replies to this post. Used as an indicator of quality.

fields.name: reads
fields.title: reads
fields.description: The number of reads of this post. Used as an indicator of quality.

fields.name: readers_count
fields.title: readers_count
fields.description: The number of unique readers (logged in) of this post. Used as an indicator of quality.

fields.name: incoming_link_count
fields.title: incoming_link_count
fields.description: The number of links from other posts to this one. Used as an indicator of quality.

fields.name: quote_count
fields.title: quote_count
fields.description: The number of quotes of this post. Used as an indicator of quality.

fields.name: like_count
fields.title: like_count
fields.description: The number of likes (on Discourse) to this post. Used as an indicator of quality.

fields.name: score
fields.title: score
fields.description: A pre-computed quality score in Discourse.

fields.name: reply_to_post_id
fields.title: reply_to_post_id
fields.description: ID of the post that this post is a reply to.

fields.name: source_username
fields.title: source_username
fields.description: The post's author.

fields.name: target_username
fields.title: target_username
fields.description: The author of the post that this post is a reply to.

fields.name: text
fields.title: text
fields.description: The posts' full text (raw).

resources.description: All posts in the PROJECTNAME conversation. The IDs for author/recipient and the text have been pseudonymized.
